title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Sometimes, your generous intentions can land you in a precarious predicament. Striving to play the hero for colleagues might have an odd effect of leaving you in need of help yourself today. For example, you could go the extra mile by agreeing to bring lunch for everyone, but then struggle hauling all the meals back to the office before the food gets cold. Although your heart is definitely in the right place, examine your motives for using such a difficult task to prove yourself without aid or better planning. Skip the dramatic gestures and trust that you and your gifts are enough. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
